channel.title: Server Status suggestion
channel.description: The front page is based on how old a server is (ex a server that was registered in 2009 would be #1 followed by newer servers) which would replace the % online idea. It's not really good that a server that was registered in November with 100% uptime beats a server that was registered over a year ago with 95% uptime.

item.title: Server Status suggestion
item.dc:creator: @vovchik30 vovchik30
item.description:
@vovchik30 wrote:

just get the number of days the server has been on in total subtract the number of days of downtime and get the percent of the uptime…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status suggestion
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s ranked by uptime and then date, I agree with you that an old server with 95% uptime is better than a new one with 100%, but do you have any ideas about how to implement that nicely?

Read full topic
